'''Frog''' is a type of frog that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Frog (Material)|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Frogs can be found in almost every nation, particularly around the waterways of [[Lisha]] and the northernmost shore of [[Minlin]] in [[Liyue]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=303 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
